title: Cassiopeia is sitting on a 42,5% winrate
body: wtf, why does she always get the very short end of the stick? why is she always such an outcast in league?

replies.body: She'll get a hotfix buff soon, I don't know when the hotfix will go live, but when the launcher updates, you know Cass'll be buffed c:
Players complained about Q range being too short now, W feeling too clunky, her passive being too weak. What does riot do? buff the E, wtf. Many cass players hate the E centered playstyle.

A hotfix is only done to fix extreme cases. 
They don't have a lot of time to work on hotfixes, so major changes won't be shipped in a hotfix.
Remember the Champion update team will be keeping a close eye on all these mages for A MONTH
Cassiopeia is also sitting on multiple buffs, just waiting for the hotfix. Give it time.

What buffs?  Seriously, hey passive wasn't a buff, her Q had the range tanked and mana cost jacked up, her E is terrible and they could of achieved the same result with her W if they'd just removed it from the game.  Also, they straight nerfed her R.

Ah, I see, I misunderstood your post, the very minor buffs to her E aren't going to do anything to address them gutting her kit though.  To be honest I doubt that they'll do anything to fix her because they've decided that this is how she's going to be, players can like it or not, Riot hadn't really given a wet fart about their player base for a long time.
Never said she was better than before the rework. Just that she has buffs coming to help out a bit.
I don't care if she's suffering. Anything is better than that abysmal Shurima rework of her.
Nah, she is straight cheeks right now.

... still WIP.

 [Will get a hotfix soon and  changes in 6.10](https://dd.reddit.com/r/CassiopeiaMains/comments/4i2jgn/riotrepertoirs_post_about_the_possible_upcoming/).

Jezuz people have some patience.
